title: Club House, Laundry Facility, Additional Storage
posting_body: ['Top Rated Apartment Community by <URL>, Cambridge House Apartment’s plush, landscaped courtyard with community pool, walking path, sundeck, shuffleboard, barbecues and picnic tables welcomes residents with the perfect environment to call “home”.', 'Each apartment offers spacious floor plans, beautiful views of the courtyard and private entry.', 'Tucked away off Van Dyke Road we offer great location with the quiet enjoyment of neighborhood living.', 'We would love for you to come on by and see what Cambridge House has to offer!', '-Upgraded Units Available', '-Club House', '-Online Payment Options (Credit Card, Debit Card and ACH)', '-No Security Deposit Required', '-Private Entrance', '-Package Acceptance', '-Sparkling Clean Swimming Pool', '-Late Fee Forgiveness', '-One $35 Application Fee Per Apartment, Not Per Person', '-BBQ & Picnic Area', '-Laundry Facility', '-Additional Storage', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change.']
